DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , double blind , placebo control , parallel group study MAP0004 adult migraineurs . Subjects self administer study drug outpatient setting .
DOC.criteria: Major Male female 18 65 year age . History episodic , acute migraine ( without aura ) onset prior 50 Major Known allergy sensitivity contraindication study drug formulation History chronic pulmonary disease , coronary artery disease ( CAD ) , liver disease , kidney disease , seizures , stroke , major psychiatric condition . Any condition , opinion Investigator , would make subject unsuitable study participation
